Name: Enter Prologue
Desc: The mission to take back the Earth begins now. —Hassen

Name: Prologue 01
Desc: Lave the rest to me.

Name: Prologue 02
Desc: With Immune Serum and pain receptors disconnected, we can continue to execute our mission.

Name: Prologue 03
Desc: Open your eyes and see the humans for who they really are through this person. I look forward to your choice after learning about the truth...

Name: A Brief Transit
Desc: To ensure the victory in the War Zone, Gray Raven decided to head further into the zone.

Name: Farewell Gift
Desc: Lucia can fight again thanks to the Construct's arm.

Name: Graffiti Blast
Desc: Traces of graffiti. Facing such eerie artwork, Liv decided to join the battle.

Name: Full Strength
Desc: Try to fight with Liv!

Name: Restoring Scene
Desc: In the simulation replay, all Gray Raven saw were the Corrupted feasting on their comrades...

Name: Lost in Mist
Desc: Artistic creations?

Name: A Soft Heart
Desc: Lucia turns silent for a short while after receiving the plushie, staring at it with an unmoving gaze.

Name: The Purpose
Desc: If you're lost, then simply walk forward. Walking forward itself can be meaningful enough.

Name: The Followers
Desc: These graffiti surprisingly captivated a lot of these Corrupted...

Name: Base Color
Desc: Hehe... this is just... for a little... base coloring...

Name: Self Analysis
Desc: I... am a free machine.

Name: Final Work
Desc: Be cursed... by... my... work...!

Name: A Strange New Friend
Desc: Indeed... Walking the path of heavens... The Construct who will rule everything... My name is... Nanami!

Name: Strange Signal
Desc: This signal... The Construct's named "Tifa"?

Name: Old Acquaintance
Desc: This is the leader of the Cerberus squad.

Name: Relic
Desc: No, I remember now... Yes, this reeks of her, we've been played.

Name: Language Game
Desc: This Inver-Device... Tifa took it off herself.

Name: Will to Survive
Desc: That's a... survivor from the Suzaku squad!

Name: Iso-Device
Desc: Corrupted gained new abilities by corrupting the Iso-Devices.

Name: Rescue Signal
Desc: The team received a signal from a Construct requesting aid. Help him as soon as possible.

Name: Will of Steel
Desc: Wait for me, Tifa... I'll... bring you back to... Babylonia...

Name: A "Safe" Exit
Desc: This is the last area linking to the Portal. A safe route can be set up here only.

Name: The Proud
Desc: What a fool. With Ascendant's power, I will fulfill the last wish of my commandant...

Name: End of Torture
Desc: —and shot a bullet into her point-blank.

Name: Seeds
Desc: Among those hypocritical and disorganized humans, I'll find an appropriate... one to be the... seed...

Name: Terminal
Desc: This is the Museum Estate. The Ascendant traces ended here.

Name: Driven by Instinct
Desc: A colossal blade whirls past—Then I'm going in! Hiya—

Name: Good Samaritan
Desc: Helping people makes me feel good!

Name: Trespassing
Desc: Even though we encountered a little trouble, we managed to get into the Estate.

Name: Traps
Desc: What secrets is the Estate hiding? And what exactly is the inheritance?

Name: Final Warning
Desc: That must be the Ascendant.

Name: Take Caution
Desc: A new variant, along with many Corrupted reinforcements, suddenly appeared in the Estate. Pass through this courtyard ASAP.

Name: Special Mission
Desc: Only Lucia can soundlessly destroy enemies.

Name: Twisted Modification
Desc: We'd better be mentally prepared for... whatever's coming.

Name: Each Loyal to Their Own
Desc: I thought you were... a good guy.

Name: A New Seed
Desc: Is that what you think... Did you not notice that my target was you from the start?

Name: Night Escape
Desc: After Kamui regains consciousness, the remaining task for Gray Raven is how to escape from here.

Name: Deduction
Desc: The calculation result is... there are no routes...

Name: Beneficiary
Desc: Take cover! Baby's gonna blow!

Name: Breaking Through
Desc: The heavy agriculture machine falls to the ground with a thud, its speaker keeps repeating something, as if calling out for someone.

Name: Lurking Sand
Desc: There's Punishing Virus reaction beneath the sand!

Name: Panic Dive
Desc: Vassago, a kind of aggressive bionic Sand Worm.

Name: Forsaken
Desc: Identity... deserter?

Name: Negotiation
Desc: Next time we meet, we'll be enemies.

Name: Left Behind
Desc: When Gray Raven almost escaped, Liv was captured by the Forsaken.

Name: Kidnapping
Desc: You kidnapped me. For this, you face the risk of warfare with Babylonia.

Name: Noises
Desc: In order to take Liv back, Gray Raven decided to split up.

Name: Bloody Truth
Desc: That gift—the box of wild mint.

Name: Traces
Desc: Without Liv, Gray Raven can only stay in place and wait for Kamui's results.

Name: Blind Fight
Desc: This doesn't look like a biosphere... It's more like the... M.I.N.D.

Name: Dispelling Illusions
Desc: As the Gray Raven has figured out how the EM projectors function, it is time to find and disable them.

Name: A Smart Path
Desc: This is a souvenir Murray gave me, a mini graviton detector.

Name: True Form
Desc: As turning the devices off by hand is too inefficient, Lucia has proposed adopting Strike Hawk's method.

Name: Suppressed Illusions
Desc: With my help, projector breaking's gonna be twice as fast!

Name: Humanoid
Desc: The Corrupted are doing an organized retreat suddenly. Gray Raven has realized that they might be controlled by someone else.

Name: Supervisor
Desc: Who do these imprisoned consciousnesses in the M.I.N.D. Test Area belong to?

Name: The Light of Seven
Desc: It's a friendly signal. Did support come?

Name: Lost Sword
Desc: Gray Raven found the Forsakens and Liv deep inside the M.I.N.D. Test Area.

Name: Turning the Table
Desc: Watanabe, I need an explanation...!

Name: Liv's Return
Desc: Connect to Liv's M.I.N.D., Commandant. Only you can save her now.

Name: Tracking the Ascendant
Desc: After resting in a Forsaken camp for a night, Gray Raven has received a new mission from Babylonia.

Name: Deep Under
Desc: Gray Raven has to go toward City 019 around 30km away.

Name: Mystery
Desc: These are the marks of resistance from the people.

Name: Powerful Reinforcement
Desc: Nanami suddenly appeared to join the battle of Gray Raven and the new type of Corrupted.

Name: Mind Noises
Desc: The concentration of Punishing Virus is skyrocketing as the team ventures further. Liv has noticed some abnormal behavior in a member.

Name: Parting Ways
Desc: Kamui suddenly left without a single explanation.

Name: Greater Threats
Desc: Please decide quickly. Some of the Corrupted on the production line have awakened.

Name: Detonation
Desc: ...Nanami, I order you to help Watanabe!

Name: Cleansing
Desc: De... tecting... thermal... reaction... purify...

Name: Retreat
Desc: Lead everyone out after the detonation.

Name: Cerberus
Desc: Kamui, when were you first corrupted?

Name: Purifying Force
Desc: Right before the Purifying Force executed the mission, Strike Hawk had connected in.

Name: Left Behind
Desc: The leader of Strike Hawk had made up his mind to save Kamui. In order to break the deadlock, Bianca was willing to make temporary concessions and help to find Kamui in the ruins.

Name: Buried Alive
Desc: Gray Raven encountered a group of aggressive Corrupted under the ground.

Name: Restructure
Desc: Gray Raven has returned to the entrance because of the Corrupted's interference. They have to map the best route ahead.

Name: Unexpected Alliance
Desc: He's Rohacchi, Nanami's pal!

Name: Split
Desc: Without a trace of Kamui, Karenina quietly left the team.

Name: Tracking
Desc: She's going after Kamui on her own.

Name: Encounter
Desc: Traces of battle between Karenina and Kamui can be found on the way following the tracks of Karenina.

Name: Abnormal Energy
Desc: When Gray Raven found Karenina, she had already lost consciousness. Liv found abnormal energy inside her... same as the one inside Kamui.

Name: Boiling Consciousness
Desc: A form of energy is trying to invade Karen's M.I.N.D.

Name: Besieged
Desc: The enemies were coming at Gray Raven once Karenina's condition was stabilized. Seeing that they moved in coordination, there must be someone behind them.

Name: Two Frontlines
Desc: We meet again, Babylonians.

Name: End of the Path
Desc: Defeat the Ascendant first!

Name: Dawn
Desc: With the authority of the Babylonian Council, I order the Gray Raven squad to withdraw immediately!

Name: Potential Unlocked
Desc: With the "help" of the president, Gray Raven have obtained supplies and continued on their way.

Name: Obstacle
Desc: The situation has been getting worse. Gray Raven decided to sneak in with a special method.

Name: Clone
Desc: Deep inside the ruins, Gray Raven encountered Nozzle, the robot that should have already been retrieved.

Name: Weeping Rose
Desc: After Nozzle is the robot butler of the same model as the butler back in the Estate. It seems that "someone" does not want Gray Raven to find Kamui.

Name: Path of Torture
Desc: It proved that those Corrupted were made by Roland through some unknown means. Suddenly, Lee left the team just like Kamui had done.

Name: Remnants
Desc: Lee's not responding to my connection, something's wrong.

Name: Trial of Torture
Desc: You'll pay for this.

Name: Justice
Desc: How'd you guarantee that it ain't a monster coming out of that tin can?

Name: Resistance
Desc: I'll never be strayed by anything, I'll only follow my own will. I have not lost yet!

Name: Devoured
Desc: I did it with my will and fought so from the beginning till now!

Name: Light and Shadow
Desc: Because, you are me, and I am you. We're both Kamui.

Name: Flying Sand
Desc: This war will likely determine the future direction of the world.

Name: Second Contact
Desc: A friendly reminder from Korolev: Dear children, please treat public facilities with love and care—

Name: Star Rift
Desc: The contents of the signal... were lines from a play... Shakespeare's "The Tempest".

Name: Reunion
Desc: At least for now, we're using each other.

Name: Self Immune
Desc: Cells infected by bacteria or viruses will be... destroyed and discarded...

Name: Digit Blade
Desc: If there is any danger, Commandant, please wake us immediately.

Name: Strict Education
Desc: This high-density body plans to give Gray Raven a lesson.

Name: Gravitational Edge
Desc: The Prism is now ready.

Name: Instant Communication
Desc: Selena said some information was related to the design of these... rings.

Name: Hetero-Core
Desc: Coated man. Floating Cube.

Name: Set
Desc: The cross ahead is named the Punishing Heteromer.

Name: Shatter
Desc: We had a discussion and decided that I would be the best candidate to fire the Prism.

Name: Chase
Desc: Watanabe turns and runs toward the gravity room's exit.

Name: Pray
Desc: The folks prayed to a certain being that they would find peace at the end of their journeys.

Name: To Akdilek
Desc: Akdilek Commercial Alliance... Wait, this diagram, is a train?

Name: Constructs on Earth
Desc: Are you surprised? Construct Tech is not something only Babylonia has.

Name: A Trade with Akdilek
Desc: After all, that is our most valuable merchandise.

Name: Choice
Desc: We can't afford to wait any longer.

Name: Omen
Desc: Golden Apple System, activate!

Name: Someone and Bianca
Desc: Aww, you're not using the motorcycle I especially prepared for you? And it's a really cool design too...

Name: Powerless
Desc: I don't plan to abandon any one of you... It is not my intention for anyone to get hurt.

Name: Hitchhike
Desc: There's no use in finding the culprit now... Let's find the way to the carriage.

Name: Gunners
Desc: As expected, Sophia has figured out the "satisfying" answer in her heart.

Name: Resolve
Desc: I can be a good merchant too!

Name: From Now On
Desc: The Eternal Engine got back on track after destroying the "goods".

Name: Eternity
Desc: Fate never favors anyone... There is no eternity, Aston.

Name: Delivery
Desc: I have confirmed the status of the "goods". Are you ready for delivery?

Name: Port
Desc: The Nighter. The oriental ship that only pulls in at night.

Name: Night Voyage
Desc: Looks like you're in big trouble, Gray Raven.

Name: Escape Room
Desc: The familiar ceiling doesn't come to sight when opening eyes. It is a locked secret chamber and there is an unusual sign of connection.

Name: Port
Desc: The only related text was about "Opera", an art form that existed in the pre-pandemic human world.

Name: Night Market
Desc: Canned pupa! Three grubs a can!

Name: Closure
Desc: Who kidnapped the commandant? The answer might be hidden on the ship that left the port.

Name: Cargo
Desc: No, that thing's called "Huaxu".

Name: Control
Desc: Lucia, you look great in this outfit!

Name: Entry
Desc: The audience feasts their eyes on this pair of embodiments of oriental beauty.

Name: The Fool
Desc: And how can you be so sure? Machines are merely lifeless creations of mankind, devoid of emotions and thoughts.

Name: Who Dreams
Desc: With Lucia as the vessel, Huaxu will become the perfect existence.

Name: Freedom
Desc: I don't understand love. I am the one who deprived you of your freedom, who always controlled you...

Name: Kowloong
Desc: The ship drifts. Everyone trains their sights upon the sea's surface, an azure painting glittering under the morning sun.

Name: Unknown Future
Desc: The team is preparing for the experiment of a new frame in Babylonia while discussing the future directions.

Name: Thorough Preparation
Desc: Apart from the new frame, Asimov is also preparing another secret weapon for Nikola.

Name: Catcher in the Rye
Desc: The Ascendants gather together and prepare to head toward the battle that will decide their fate.

Name: Mist
Desc: After a seemingly endless wait, the Nighter was finally coming ashore.

Name: Rejection
Desc: The crew weren't welcomed, but rejected instead.

Name: Gathering
Desc: The real Huaxu must not fall into the hands of Ascendants. Babylonia forces started gathering.

Name: Break the Ice
Desc: In the arctic land, the fisher was urging the sailor to hurry. Forest Guards were chasing after the Corrupted.

Name: Chaos
Desc: Everybody had their own plan. Except Babylonia.

Name: Hawk & Hound
Desc: The joint operation between Cerberus and Strike Hawk didn't seem to be going well.

Name: War Decision
Desc: The actions taken by different parties only further accelerated the war.

Name: Frankenstein
Desc: It was complete mayhem in Kowloong City. They seemed to have underestimated the Ascendants.

Name: Smile
Desc: War was imminent. Gray Raven made a promise.

Name: Support Force
Desc: Never underestimate the Support Force! —Bridget

Name: Sister
Desc: The two Lucias met again in Kowloong City.

Name: Accumulation
Desc: Seriously wounded, Lucia was removed from the frontline for recovery, while Gray Raven received an unexpected reinforcement.

Name: Ticket
Desc: Two leaders were having a conversation in a station.

Name: Lamia's Poison
Desc: As an Ascendant, Lamia specialized in manipulating her enemies.

Name: Corporation
Desc: Qu decided to take one step further for the Corporation.

Name: Hawk Hunt
Desc: In order to rescue fellow comrades, Strike Hawk was forced to confront Lamia.

Name: Mermaid of Hatred
Desc: Strike Hawk's effort wasn't wasted. Kowloong guards decided to join forces against Lamia.

Name: Shield
Desc: Lucia was already on her way, so Strike Hawk decided to first create a path.

Name: Crisis
Desc: A golden powder was seen on the battlefield between Cerberus and Roland.

Name: Onboard Entertainment
Desc: The train was getting close to Kowloong—

Name: Promise
Desc: Far away from the battle, Lucia woke up—

Name: Inside the Light Wall
Desc: Gray Raven managed to get through the light wall, only to be greeted by Kowloong's defense force.

Name: At the Door
Desc: There were also different opinions within the light wall. What would happen...?

Name: The Warden
Desc: Gray Raven met Qu in the tower and discovered Kowloong's real intention.

Name: Plume
Desc: On the Observatory Plume shone bright.

Name: Hope
Desc: It was over... For now.

Name: Hidden Current_01
Desc: Information saved

Name: Hidden Current_02
Desc: Information saved

Name: Hidden Current_03
Desc: Information saved

Name: Decision Altitude
Desc: 77.3% of the conventional engines have been forcibly shut down. Babylonia is falling!

Name: A Familiar Sight
Desc: The virtual space looks completely normal, but there is something hidden underneath.

Name: Unexpected Bolt
Desc: You encounter unexpected events, both friendly and hostile... both commanded and improvised.

Name: Fake Friendship
Desc: False is false.

Name: Profile of Bait
Desc: Veritas ends in pursuit.

Name: Fragile Relationship
Desc: Is relationship and bond between people strong or frail?

Name: Breaking a Deadlock
Desc: Finally, there is a hope to break the deadlock.

Name: Shutting
Desc: All signals come to a screeching halt here.

Name: Huaxu
Desc: No matter who "it" works for, you've got to make it stop.

Name: S.S.D.D
Desc: The crisis in Babylonia is lifted temporarily. And everything returns to normal.

Name: Enhance Inverse
Desc: If you see something too dangerous, don't let curiosity get the best of you.

Name: Recover Clue
Desc: It seems that we will maintain this perspective until the end of this mission.

Name: Enemies in Sight
Desc: Projections of Corrupted, the Corrupted, growths of punishing...

Name: Crimson Tide
Desc: The four of you gaze into the red tide of life and death, just like how it gazes back.

Name: Shades of the Past
Desc: Looks like... this commandant must have been dead for over a week.

Name: Piper
Desc: They seem to be lured by the "sound of the flute" and submerge in the sea of crimson.

Name: Hetero-Creature
Desc: These Corrupted have started to develop biological traits. Simply calling them "Corrupted" would be inaccurate.

Name: Plunder & Sacrifice
Desc: In order to survive, we have to decide what to accept, as difficult to bear as they are... That's the price.

Name: Past & Future
Desc: Please don't hate me.

Name: Blood Link
Desc: ...Will I become someone like her?

Name: Continue Forward
Desc: Carefully, Liv opens the faded cover, and a white petal falls out onto her hand.

Name: Full of Thorns
Desc: There are more traps ahead, so be careful.

Name: We Were Here
Desc: I would still have some foolish hope had that never happened.

Name: Shattered Fragments
Desc: It's up to you to decide when to let Lucia get that memory back.

Name: City of Fakes
Desc: It's not that it was abandoned... It was never even occupied.

Name: Red Tide's Guidance
Desc: Go back to the source—to the abyss.

Name: Welcoming Ceremony
Desc: The broken remains remind you of "corpses."

Name: Curtain
Desc: Since our guests have arrived at the door, there is no reason not to entertain them.

Name: Unexpected Support
Desc: Then, let me be your mission support from now on.

Name: Ascension Secrets
Desc: A blindfolded queen, an advisor, and a beast.

Name: Test
Desc: Or is this another "test" of yours?

Name: Question
Desc: Can you really put that blade of yours in Luna's heart?

Name: Fury of the Agent
Desc: If these weaklings are your "final plan," I must say I'm quite disappointed.

Name: Master of Ceremony
Desc: Miss Luna, this is my answer to your question—

Name: Cross the Bridge
Desc: Whether in sight or out of sight, the Support Sorce are always working.

Name: Huaxu's Projection
Desc: What does the appearance of Huaxu's projection here really mean?

Name: Visitor
Desc: Be careful of that Lucia.

Name: Crimson Resolve
Desc: Lucia... Quickly! Commandant's going to...

Name: Divergence Point
Desc: I will accept your everything—your pain, your choices.

Name: Sealed Past
Desc: Don't worry, you'll be the next.

Name: Shards of Remorse
Desc: Before falling into complete silence, Lucia clutches the nameplate in her hand...

Name: Chaotic Memories
Desc: The shards of each other's memories cross the boundary between them, like fragments of glass pouring down after it breaks, scattering in front of their eyes.

Name: Lost Heart
Desc: Running your mouth when you're so lost and miserable. Is that who you are now?

Name: Lucia
Desc: This is your reward for facing your past.

Name: To the Future
Desc: Welcome back, Lucia.

Name: Polyphage Abyss
Desc: Underneath this behemoth is a lake composed of the Red Tide, shimmering in its fearsome scarlet glow.

Name: A Perfect Disguise?
Desc: If it was not Murray, who is it?

Name: Audio Analysis
Desc: It is impossible to find Lamia by blindly searching, so this is the time to check the tips.

Name: Mermaid's Gift
Desc: Hee hee, take it—it's Lamia's petty concern.

Name: Mermaid Caught Up
Desc: Lamia has nowhere to run.

Name: Horrifying Marks
Desc: Only cracked and shattered rocks remain when you arrive at the epicenter.

Name: Cannibalism
Desc: Miss Luna... Please serve your final duty as an agent...

Name: Resolve
Desc: Besides, Gray Raven is at its best when we are together, right?

Name: Mermaid's Purpose
Desc: "Go, complete your task."

Name: Huge Threat
Desc: Battle is the only option against the roaring Polyphage.

Name: Confession
Desc: This time, I'm choosing to believe in "myself."

Name: Race Against Time
Desc: Despite the many enemies ahead of her, Lucia knows the bullets and beams coming from her teammates will clear her way.

Name: Awake and Destroy
Desc: The end... is nigh!

Name: Game in a Cage
Desc: "Be careful with your words and action. Don't do anything now. Wait until morning to inspect the room."

Name: Conceal
Desc: "Where did you get the Ascendant data?"

Name: Return to Core Area
Desc: Feels like we're being watched.

Name: Untraceable
Desc: Maybe there's an easier and more straightforward way.

Name: Gaze of the Abyss
Desc: Like a dark abyss, the pinhole spy camera on the button gazes at Chrome, who is holding it in his palm.

Name: New Woes
Desc: Mom... is resting.

Name: Recycle Prisoner
Desc: We don't get to do this everyday. Let me give you a bonus question.

Name: Perfectionism
Desc: He speaks with no lofty words and acts like a modest teacher before his enemies.

Name: Fated Maze
Desc: The rumbling underneath the floor announces death like a countdown timer.

Name: No Response
Desc: Kamui spots a faint smile on Chrome's face before Chrome completely loses consciousness.

Name: Project Winter
Desc: If we ever settle this, we will need the talented commandant to help us build a future for humans.

Name: Extra Mission
Desc: Looks like some people are leaving no stone unturned, considering they've bugged our transport craft, too.

Name: Hidden Area
Desc: The dim light from the sky nourishes the surrounding red trees, and root-like pipes coil around them, revealing a peaceful but strange atmosphere.

Name: Hetero-Hive Mother
Desc: Sorry... For leaving you alone to deal with such a thing.

Name: Starry Sky
Desc: Even if the signal is broken, and even if hope is scarce, I will run to you no matter what. That's salvation, as well as saving myself.

Name: Right Under the Rose
Desc: As long as we're on this ship together, nothing will remain a secret forever.

Name: Strike
Desc: The red-haired Construct stands amidst them proudly like a rose above its thorns.

Name: Seaborne Graveyard
Desc: That's right. The city you're standing in was once a zero-point reactor.

Name: Atlantis
Desc: It once contained humanity's hope for a utopia, after all.

Name: Enter the City
Desc: If the Golden Age is a crown, then this is one of the brightest jewels on it.

Name: Return
Desc: I've... finally found it.

Name: Graveyard for the Arrogance
Desc: Humans have long died on the road to their ambitions. This city is just a graveyard for their arrogance.

Name: Another Journey
Desc: Atlantis lived, and so did they.

Name: Up or Down
Desc: Don't tell me the city's haunted.

Name: Light of the Zero-point Energy
Desc: I believe humanity will have a bright future.

Name: Raise Your Torch
Desc: I wouldn't, because I want to find out what is there at the end of the darkness.

Name: The Last Human
Desc: Who would have thought that, in the end, I'd go gentle into that good night?

Name: Across the Waves
Desc: Vera knows that gaze intimately. The look of total desperation was once in her eyes as well.

Name: Her Flag
Desc: Rage, rage against the dying of the light.

Name: World Government Conference
Desc: The mark of the World Government which bears the hope of humanity appears at the top of the room with dignity. Another "World Government Conference" is about to start.

Name: Antagonism
Desc: Science is a torch that lights the way to humanity's future, not a wind that fans the flame of some civil war.

Name: After Story
Desc: The logs have been arranged from left to right chronologically by Liv. Your fingertip flips over a page, and another memory is reawakened in your mind.

Name: Search for Coordinates

Name: Clockwork
Desc: He winds up the war machine that is you all, the elites of Babylonia, and you march on toward CPF 040.

Name: CPF 040

Name: Arrival

Name: Evacuation
Desc: In the last few moments before you fall unconscious, you hear thunderous explosions.

Name: Death of Humankind

Name: Silent Scream

Name: The Rudder of Mankind

Name: Sinking Island

Name: Project Winter

Name: Within Reach
Desc: But there is no "would have."

Name: Ring "The Bells"

Name: Sixth, "Death"

Name: To Life →
Desc: ― Start from the "death" of self and move into the future.

Name: Curiosity

Name: Frog Plushie

Desc: It rests peacefully under the Kowloong Metropolis, where it should remain undisturbed.

Name: History
Desc: This is the archives of the Kowloon Chamber of Commerce. It is a symbol of history and glory. It stands in a corner of the KCC as a witness to the footprints of our ancestors.

Name: Illusion
Desc: The monarch will merely be a facade created out of authority before the masses.

Name: Cloud
Desc: Looking toward the sound, they see a young woman in white and the wooden cart behind her seemed to belong in a museum.

Name: Chaos
Desc: Yin whispers softly. Qu stands overlooking the entirety of Kowloong.

Name: Theme
Desc: These are the themes of this era that shape the world.

Name: Reign
Desc: When people look up to the Sovereign, they see what they want to see.

Name: Shattered Hope
Desc: When all hope turns into despair...

Name: Lightless Night
Desc: When night never ends, and tomorrow never comes...

Name: Dirty Monsters
Desc: When monsters lose their value, they no longer deserve to live.

Name: Unblessed Birth
Desc: When an unblessed birth arrives from heaven, is it destruction or salvation?

Name: Iron Will
Desc: When the end is nigh, the body may be corrupted, but the soul will never be tainted.

Name: Farewell for Reunion
Desc: When everything is destroyed, the remains must be my eternal paradise with you.

Name: Dialogue between the Strongs
Desc: The recording of a dialogue.

Name: "Turandot"
Desc: Because now that she knew her sin, she recognized that it was he who would bestow the final judgment upon her.

Name: Divine Comedy
Desc: Eden thanks you for your efforts. You have been brave warriors and humanity will always remember your glory.

Name: Faust
Desc: That's the greatest honor I have ever received.

Name: Tempest
Desc: She was now a vessel that contained the legacy of everyone in the Advance Force.

Name: Epilogue
Desc: Now my charms are all o'erthrown, and what strength I have's mine own.

Name: Auguries of Innocence
Desc: God does a human form display, to those who dwell in realms of day.

Name: Between the Acts
Desc: She suddenly heard someone singing with a low voice nearby.

Name: The Beginning of Lies
Desc: The moment you see beyond the lies and find reality, a certain string will begin to tighten... or snap.

Name: Indifference
Desc: All of these are familiar, like a scene repeated from the past.

Name: Growing Fear
Desc: Wanshi tries to find some words to comfort the Construct, but everything he can think of points to an answer that he has known long ago.

Name: Long Night
Desc: Wanshi cupped his hands to catch some water, only to let it slip through his fingers. He shook his head and walked out of the bathroom.

Name: Flag
Desc: Because we're a "flag."

Name: Deep Sleep
Desc: It's not too bad.

Name: The Conversation that Never Existed
Desc: Bianca thinks for a while, then removes Jett's speech from the file.

Name: Banquet
Desc: All he can see is a charade, its foundation crumbling at any second.

Name: Layout
Desc: In that case, we can finally move on to the next stage of the specialized frame project.

Name: Martyrs
Desc: Even... if we live to see the day we win... there won't be a future for us, will there?

Name: Path
Desc: I've made my choice.

Name: The Chess Player
Desc: I'll use "Smith" to become "Chrome".

Name: Stratagem
Desc: I was ready long before I stepped through the door.

Name: Fledging Eagle
Desc: It has never been a kite that needs an anchor in his hands, but an eagle with its wings spread, ready to fly.

Name: Cage
Desc: Angel? You've got to be joking. I'm the devil... here to take you back to hell.

Name: Wild Beast
Desc: Calming down, No .21 stops and looks at the others with only vigilance and curiosity in her eyes, just like a newborn beast.

Name: Choice
Desc: It may be the best—or worst decision to let you follow me. But here, things can only get worse.

Name: Journey to Light
Desc: For some reason, No. 21 cannot help but believe what the Construct before her is saying. Is it because of her threatening color? Or the light in her eyes?

Name: Return
Desc: My name? My name is a designation. No. 21 is my designation.

Name: Homeward
Desc: Collapsed bricks and Corrupted remains pile up before No. 21. Vital fluid drips into the pits of the cement floor. Yet she is white as snow, seemingly fading into the light.

Name: Cerberus
Desc: "Hmph. Are you my new crew?" The red-haired man smiles, showing his fangs like a vicious dog.

Name: Hero And Death
Desc: A hero must be a hero, whatever it takes

Name: Redemption in Falsehood
Desc: A lie is always a lie... If you aren't a hero, you will never be one.

Name: Cruel Truth
Desc: Who will understand the truth in the cruel words?

Name: Idealistic Edge
Desc: The only thing you can hold on to... is this moment, and who you are right now.

Name: Ovation in Flowers and Rain
Desc: The unknown hero fights to the last moment in flowers and rain.

Name: Follow the Banner
Desc: Ahead is death and our only hope. As long as the flag stands, you have nothing to fear.

Name: Praise for the Future
Desc: I'm leaving everything to you... The "Lloyd" of the future.

Name: Ad Time
Desc: Welcome to the show!

Name: Sidelights

Name: Popcorn Scene
Desc: Audience clapping, audience enjoying. Audience chewing popcorn, audience cheering.

Name: Action Scene
Desc: Run, Roland.

Name: Prologue
Desc: His life has finally started moving.

Name: Stinger that Nobody Is Watching
Desc: I guess I'll make her wish come true.

Desc: A traveler's confessions.

Name: "Epiphany"
Desc: An unpublished interview report.

Name: "Annunciation"

Name: "Resurrection"
Desc: A thousand memories flood in with a painful sorrow.

Name: The Prophecy of Simeon
Desc: The more she understands, the more painful it is. The more she knows, the more torn she feels. But she has the innocence to fight against the pain and the perseverance to fight against the despair.

Name: The Shepherd
Desc: For she hears the audience's innocent call, and she hears the performers' tender reply.

Name: The Little Girl Lost
Desc: The lovely girl told. She had wandered long, hearing that performer's song.

Name: Festival of Innocence
Desc: The girl and her friends raising their innocent hands. Now like a mighty wind they raise to heaven the voice of song.

Name: Festival of Vicissitudes
Desc: Is that mourning cry a song? Can it be a song of joy?

Name: The Fly
Desc: The feeling of empathy is life, strength, and breath.

Desc: Youth of delight! Come here and see the opening morn, image of truth new-born.

Name: Echoes of the Ancient Bard
Desc: She stumbles all night in the hollow universe.

Name: Night Boat
Desc: Hundreds of years passed in the flutter of a butterfly's wings, and I sigh when I look back at the past. Spring has just arrived today, yet the flowers will wither tomorrow. Drink before the night ends and the lights go out.

Name: Ancient Pouring Glass
Desc: I used to drink wine and enjoy music for days and squander my money just for fun. It is after I bid farewell that I realize how much time I have wasted away.

Name: Return of a Distant Dawn
Desc: The plum tree branches cross the moon, creating a special atmosphere. The plum blossoms shade the moonlight, leaving dot shadows in the glass. No matter how I lament the past, those days have long gone. It's hard to see my old friends again.

Name: Dream Song
Desc: It was drizzling and windy last night. I slept in but still felt drunk. I ask the maid who is rolling up the shades, yet she tells me that the flowers are still in blossom. Don't you know that there should be more leaves than flowers?

Name: Sadness of Farewell
Desc: I wish to bid farewell, but my words fail me. He departs from me into the flowers and grass. There I stand, waving goodbye to him. The cherry blossoms are still in bloom and the willow leaves are still abundant, yet the wind of spring is blowing in the cold rain.

Name: Song of Fragrance
Desc: The silk handkerchief is soaked by the sudden burst of tears. It's hard to resist the sadness of not being able to see him. My sleep is shallow, yet the screen stands tall in this silent long night.

Name: New Farewell Song
Desc: We are separated by the Yangtze River. One stands on the north bank, and the other stands on the south bank. With whom should we drink wine and admire the moon tonight?

Name: Cottie
Desc: The leader of the mysterious organization only briefly existed in history. What's the true identity of this Memory?

Name: Einsteina

Name: Becky

Name: Athmail

Desc: Somehow, the battle felt different from your usual experiences.

Name: SP-04

Name: SP-04
Desc: The battle was a deadlock, but you received unexpected help. Was "she" really just an AI?

Name: SP-03
Desc: Asimov and Rosetta found the information hidden under the AI's noises. The test must be stopped!

Name: SP-04
Desc: You finally completed the test mission, but the system AI had an error.

Name: SP-01
Desc: Your mind was trapped within Virtual Horizon. The AI that had been guiding you told you her name was "Ann." She hoped you could stay and fight forever.

Name: SP-02
Desc: Ann was attacked by a monster that resembled Amberia. She then realized she was only Amberia's backup persona. Just when she was about to be devoured, the Construct she created saved her.

Name: SP-03
Desc: Ann wanted to break free from the system, but the only way out was to defeat the monster "Amberia." She and all the Constructs would help you.

Name: SP-04
Desc: Finally, you defeated the monster, but everything would soon be forgotten when you wake up, and Ann fell into an eternal sleep once again.

Desc: After a series of dreadful events, your summer finally began.

Name: Arctic Reunion
Desc: Commandant decided to accept Rosetta's request and head to the ARU with her.

Name: Reinforcements
Desc: Lost in the middle of nowhere, Commandant and Rosetta met some reinforcements who came to rescue them.

Name: Captain and Tide
Desc: Knowing the tide always visit on a regular interval, ARU was hoping Commandant and the Babylonia reinforcements could help them hold off the tide.

Name: Snowy Skirmish
Desc: The fishermen had already engaged with the bionics. They needed immediate help.

Name: Speedster
Desc: After reuniting with Simon and the Forest Guards, Rosetta decided to use her old centaur form against the tide.

Name: United Nightmare
Desc: The name "Amberia" was heard during the battle.

Name: The Past
Desc: Amberia was supposed to be destroyed long ago. After questioning the Captain, he finally explained what happened in the past.

Name: Research Building
Desc: The team headed toward the Forest Guard's birthplace to search for the "codes" that could control Amberia.

Name: Codes
Desc: After defeating the bionics near the research building, the team finally found the codes and the data of humanoid-hybrids.

Name: Inver-Narwhal
Desc: The tide of bionics rushed toward the crowd, and someone took the codes away.

Name: Blood Trail
Desc: The team followed the traitor and found a way to Amberia's location.

Name: Frozen Battlefield
Desc: Under the frozen land was lots of weapons and bionic production lines. A voice told the team the truth.

Name: Ice Venture
Desc: Although separated from Diana and others, Rosetta decided to continue moving forward with Commandant alone.

Name: Another Battlefield
Desc: Everybody was fighting in their own way.

Name: Amberia
Desc: In the lab at the very bottom, Commandant and Rosetta finally met Amberia, who once was called Atiel.

Name: The Unlucky
Desc: Rosetta pointed her weapon at Amberia, vowing to end this nightmare once and for all with Commandant.

Name: Farewell to Nightmare
Desc: Amberia had fallen. Time to say goodbye to this nightmare.

Name: We Lucky Few
Desc: Rosetta and Commandant witnessed the end of Amberia and her nightmare. A new day had started.

Name: Dusty Memory
Desc: A theater exists in every city of the KCC, in the corner surrounded by courtyards and old streets. It is lofty and grandiose, but at the same time, it is old and dilapidated.

Name: Theater Crisis
Desc: We can still quit with our heads held high, If we sell the theater, we can use this money as a fresh start for each and every one of us. If we wait this out, then... There won't be any money to line our pockets.

Name: Against the Current
Desc: In a world of young people, they should be the stars.

Name: Changing Tide
Desc: The KCC... is about to change.

Name: Reunion
Desc: Changyu perked up with a smile out of surprise at the sight of after seeing a familiar face after so long.

Name: Battle of Changban
Desc: Heroes never fear death.

Name: Disconnected
Desc: Smoke from the war covers the once prosperous city, disconnecting the people of Kowloong from their future and past.

Name: Answer
Desc: Qu slowly closed her eyes upon hearing Huaxu's response.

Name: Before the Storm
Desc: The once prosperous KCC is now long gone. A few pedestrians gather near the broadcast on the street.

Name: Will of Kowloong
Desc: Kowloong is a crystal, nucleated from history. Kowloongers do not fear war, because war cannot break the will of Kowloong.

Name: Legacy
Desc: I will inherit your will.

Name: Homecoming
Desc: You're home, Moyuan...

Name: Tabula Akasha
Desc: Our history will not end like this.

Name: Unnamed War
Desc: Two Tai'E are activated in a deserted factory, only to find out that an apocalyptic war had broken out while they were hibernating.

Name: Unexpected Encounter
Desc: Tai'E decided to follow their order and go back, but accidentally met a human child. The priority written in their program means they have more important things to do now.

Name: Area of Defense
Desc: We must quickly go past this area of defense before more of those things appear. I'll go first, you take her and follow me.

Name: Little Promise
Desc: Is it because of the preset command, or is he having an error? He could not tell.

Name: Duty of Tai'E
Desc: I will fulfil the duty of Tai'E.

Name: Farewell
Desc: During his service in Kowloong, there was nothing that he could take pride in. Those memories were the only thing that supported him and made him happy.

Name: Black Guardian
Desc: Kowloong Art

Name: Requiem
Desc: One Against Thousand

Name: Operation Red Tide
Desc: They are heading toward the shoreline.

Name: Lone Hawk
Desc: There does not seem to be any fear in Wanshi. He just let out a big yawn instead.

Name: Land for No "Man"
Desc: One must face his own weakness to embrace the future.

Name: Abyss of Gravity
Desc: Born here, so chose to die here too.

Name: Never Ending
Desc: You left us behind like junk, now you dare to come back and "rescue" us? Are you kidding me?

Name: Ashes to Ashes
Desc: "For the greater good." Oh, it never gets old. How morally sound. I am truly amazed.

Name: Reason to Fight
Desc: Even if we don't know what awaits us there.

Name: Voice of Yesterday
Desc: Only from that lullaby could they feel the last bit of warmth from their past.

Name: Whalesong
Desc: The singing stopped, but the song had no ending, because the lonely whale never found its herd.

Name: "Siren"
Desc: "Selena."

Name: Requiem
Desc: Eternity in an hour.

Name: Cradle of Immortality
Desc: She only wants to tell you all the miracles she saw along the journey.

Name: Silent Battlefield
Desc: It was an early afternoon when Kamui accidentally discovered a slightly swollen metal can in Wanshi's storage. It reminded Wanshi of his distant past.

Name: Gear?
Desc: Just an insignificant "gear." My job is to ensure that all operations run smoothly.

Name: Gamble
Desc: I'm betting Langston Smith's name on it.

Name: Awaken
Desc: The world was no longer pale as Wanshi regained consciousness. He realized he was inside a building.

Name: Echoes of the Past
Desc: The white city continuously altered its shape. Refracted sunlight shone from above, unveiling a blue ocean of data behind it.

Name: Encounter
Desc: So this is the guy behind all those unexpected accidents.

Name: Frog in the Well
Desc: I have been hiding for too long, but I feel like going out there today.

Name: Journey's End
Desc: You can explore the space, or take back the Earth for yourselves. It doesn't matter.

Name: The Forgotten Children
Desc: This is Babylonia, not the research institute or Kurono. There are no unexpected menace and experiments on her path that would put her on a leash.

Name: Suspiria
Desc: "Welcome home!"

Name: The Mist
Desc: Shaped like a stuffed animal, it is too dirty to tell its original color, save for the bright red of its cracked lips. The two stiff, sad glass eyeballs, poorly sewn, have melted, staring straight at No. 21.

Name: Kairo
Desc: A speeding police car stops before you, and Noctis pokes his head out from the rolled-down window wearing a pair of sunglasses he has found, whistling loudly.

Name: Let the Right One In
Desc: The black fog dissipates, not disappearing completely, retreating to somewhere not far behind you. But it is far enough from her for now, and she is safe from being immediately devoured.

Name: Insidious
Desc: No. 21 approaches the shade instinctively for a closer look. But the moment she steps forward, all images disappear, leaving behind the Medic Bots and equipment in the dilapidated corridors as if nothing has happened.

Name: Cabin in the Woods
Desc: The night wind howls and an unearthly light shines overhead, casting No. 21 in the shadow of the giant house behind the iron gate.

Name: The Skeleton Key
Desc: The storage before you turns into a few empty shelves on the wall. A scrawled, child-like picture painted with red crayons sits above, with "Go to Hell and meet Voooo" written next to it. It looks ridiculous but scary.

Name: The Thirteenth Floor
Desc: The two girls look at each other and nod. That is the last communication between them.

Name: Hour of the Wolf
Desc: "—I'm going to kill you! I'm going to tear you apart! I'm going to rip your insides out and rub them on your face!"

Name: The Chasers
Desc: Her laser cannon soars with Buddy, and she breaks through her shackles like a runaway beast. Her minute figure lashes out massive waves of energy, like a wolf finally revealing its fangs.

Name: Sixth Sense
Desc: Wind passes through the withered tree and the lifeless houses over the nameless graves full of white crosses. An insignificant white daisy on the edge of the grave sways, hoping the wind will carry it away, but the wind cannot.

Name: Shome
Desc: The sound of anxious back-and-forth pacing fills the research room, deep in the facility.

Name: Crushed Bones
Desc: Covet that which shan't be coveted, and be prepared to go through fire and water.

Name: The Forgotten Land
Desc: Wind blows over the vast desert, sweeping up sand and dust into a storm.

Name: Venus Splash Park
Desc: At the moment of its completion, time became frozen on this enchanted isle. The observation platform, dreamily hanging in the sky, looks almost like a border between fantasy and reality.

Name: Game Starts
Desc: Everything will end here, through a spectacular finale.

Name: Ascension-Network
Desc: Hmph, and what have you discovered? —Huff... The essence of... the Ascension-Network.

Name: Suspicions
Desc: I keep thinking she seems a little weird today.

Name: A Trivial Moment
Desc: The sound of footsteps come from the end of the walkway, adding from liveliness to the sluggish street.

Name: Nanami and Martin
Desc: When the girl met the bear, they decided to celebrate with fireworks.

Name: Bionic Machine
Desc: Nanami learned that Amberia would control the bionics to harm humans. She decided to do something.

Name: Black Figure on Snow
Desc: Some strange black figures were crawling amongst the bionics.

Name: Different Opinions
Desc: Not all the bionics believed they were "manipulated." Instead, they saw Amberia's will as their own.

Name: Roaring
Desc: Nanami decided to talk to Amberia in person, but the war broke out before she could go underground.

Name: Resonance of Anger
Desc: There was nothing but sorrow in the battle between the bionics and the ARU. Nanami decided to give everything she had to stop the war.

Name: The Black Figure
Desc: "I will never forgive you, Ascendants!"

Name: Nanami and Bionics
Desc: The war had ended, but the wounds were still there. Nanami cheerfully took the bionics away from the snowy land.

Name: Silence
Desc: I didn't think an AI could fall silent.

Name: Exile
Desc: You're right. My point is, Huaxu may have a new master, but has her master... really changed?

Name: Mutual Destruction
Desc: No matter how many times you destroy us, people will remember. Atop these ruins they will build anew. You will never understand.

Name: Air Transportation
Desc: All that the crew can do is remain in their seats, ensure that equipment and weapons are operational, and review mission details in preparation for immediate engagement upon landing on the surface.

Name: Chief Commander
Desc: Let me re-introduce myself. My name is Vanessa, commandant of Egret and chief commander of this operation.

Name: Under the Trap
Desc: Severed Corrupted limbs fall into the pit as they enveloped in blue static and crash into the bottom of the pit heavily.

Name: Rapid Descent
Desc: Your brain went blank from the zero gravity free-fall.

Name: Night Break
Desc: Unobstructed beams of moonlight shine through the windows, bring dim light into the dark interior.

Name: Secret of Victory
Desc: Deception, exploitation, abandonment... These are the laws of victory on the battlefield.

Name: Exchange of Resources
Desc: Well then, take her away. I've been growing tired of playing with the same toy anyway.

Name: Gray Raven's Edge
Desc: The electronic photo frame on the table in the lounge finally has a suitable picture.

Name: Like Fate
Desc: Why—is it you?

Name: Collection
Desc: What happened along the way.

Name: Nothing
Desc: Hermano.

Name: Free Riding Guide
Desc: Should I say unexpected or no surprise.

Name: Luna's World
Desc: A monster? A corpse? A weakling? A lost lamb?

Name: Break-in
Desc: I like to throw in a few variables beyond their control when they think their plan is foolproof.

Name: Non-lethal Joke
Desc: They... they're coming...!

Name: Lopsided Recall
Desc: You can't just play, "Voodoo"...

Name: Cage Battle
Desc: Roland never sees the cycle and intertwining of these expressions in the same face.

Name: Ending Citation
Desc: I could take your life now, but I haven't.

Name: Fisher
Desc: I can give you what you want.

Name: Undecided Middlegame
Desc: With a smirk of an epiphany, Roland goes to his unknown destiny.

Name: Mystery of the Light Pillar
Desc: In the center of Golden Vortex was a group of buildings shrouded in the "Golden Pillar". Its origin was still unknown to Gray Raven.

Name: Value of Existence
Desc: Yesterday at noon time, Goldfinch changed their mission objective and started heading toward the center of Golden Vortex.

Name: Contribution
Desc: As the night started to fall, Goldfinch members seemed to have foreseen their upcoming fate...

Name: Lone Raven
Desc: After the communication with Liv was cut, Lee left to search for her. Lucia stayed back with the commandant.

Name: Royal Guards
Desc: The queen's royal guards chased after Lucia and the commandant. They had to run for almost an hour...

Name: Red Light, Green Light
Desc: Minutes after Lee left, he was trapped among a group of guards with peculiar behaviors...

Name: Big Gamble
Desc: Lee fought a tough battle in the underground secret passage. The guards wanted to trap him to death...

Name: Letter of Invitation
Desc: When Lucia was trapped in a tough fight, the mysterious queen sent her royal guards to invite the commandant to her palace.

Name: Queen's Arrival
Desc: It was nearly noon, the sun was hanging high in the sky and scorching the Golden Vortex. The "Golden Queen" finally revealed herself...

Name: Digging Site
Desc: Browning finally found the device after searching in the desert for almost 40 minutes. But it was covered under some golden powder...

Name: Aftermath
Desc: After more than 10 minutes of digging, the device was almost out. But Browning triggered a landmine underneath it...

Name: Cheap Shot
Desc: Liv returned to her Construct after 5 minutes of hacking into the system. But Browning...

Name: Explosive Encounter
Desc: Liv seized the opportunity for a "mutual destruction" with Browning...

Name: Maverick
Desc: Watanabe reached the Golden Vortex in the morning. The enemy info was still unknown, but he charged in alone.

Name: Risk Transfer
Desc: 10 minutes into the Golden Vortex, Watanabe met Bianca and decided to follow her.

Name: Saving the Earth
Desc: After sending Liv away, Bianca searched in the sand for half an hour because she had figured out Babylonia's real intention...

Name: Old Habit
Desc: It didn't take long before Watanabe was forced to reveal himself...

Name: Choice
Desc: Watanabe's rescue plan faced challenge immediately after he got away from Bianca...

Name: Relic
Desc: After leaving the weather engine, Watanabe found a pendant of the Forsaken from a guard...

Name: Queen's Treat
Desc: Golden Queen revealed her true form to Gray Raven. Meanwhile, Bianca had explored Golden Vortex for hours, but the sample analysis still hadn't succeeded...

Name: Queen's Request
Desc: Golden Queen announced her requests to the commandant and Babylonia in her palace.

Name: Promise
Desc: Watanabe and Bianca fought for almost 10 minutes, but neither was going to win. The guards took the opportunity and laid siege on them...

Name: Off Form
Desc: Kamui and Roland fought all the way to the northwest of Golden Vortex, when Kamui discovered some anomaly in Roland's Construct...

Name: Promise Keeper
Desc: It took Watanabe an hour to make sure all Forsaken had safely evacuated. Some tried to persuade him not to return and help Bianca...

Name: Hostage
Desc: After defeating the "Silent Guards", Bianca followed the strange noise into a secret chamber with humans locked up in it...

Name: Two Ways of Rescue
Desc: Bianca defeated the warden and freed all the hostages. Bianca stopped her as he wanted to take his own men.

Name: Golden Antibody
Desc: Despite letting the hostage go, Bianca still took the Golden Antibody... But the royal guards suddenly attacked her!

Name: Negotiation
Desc: After confronting each other for many more minutes, Kamui almost made Roland devastated...

Name: For Commandant
Desc: Bianca fought alongside the Forsaken to defeat the royal guards. Once again, she faced different choices...

Name: Follower
Desc: Karenina sneaked into the Golden Vortex from the south. But she didn't know she was being followed...

Name: Human Experiment
Desc: Nanami joined Karenina to defeat the guards of the main building together, but she disappeared within 5 minutes...

Name: Starting Again
Desc: The communication was restored for minutes and Karenina completed her mission with flying colors. It's up to her where she wants to go now.

Name: Resistance
Desc: Blasting through dozens of walls, Karenina decided to explore Golden Vortex in her own way...

Name: Merge
Desc: Nanami returned, but she brought bad news about Roland the Ascendant...

Name: Vision
Desc: Nanami's hacking only took a few minutes. She failed to trace Roland in the internal network, but she found out that Nithart took the commandant of Gray Raven...

Name: Tracking the Sound
Desc: After defeating golden guards and royal guards, they were only one door away from the commandant...

Name: Deterrence
Desc: Under Roland's order, the Corrupted managed to stall Kamui for over 2 hours, only to make him fight even harder...

Name: Hospitality
Desc: After getting rid of Kamui, Roland carefully assessed the threat of Golden Antibody...

Name: Seeking Help
Desc: Captured by Nithart, Roland was unfortunately covered in the antibody and suffered for 90 minutes...

Name: Communication Disorder
Desc: After leaving Karenina, Nanami finally found the thing that caught her attention.

Name: Blockage
Desc: Roland spent an hour calling for help, but the reinforcement didn't arrive as expected.

Name: Mutual Destruction
Desc: Due to the antibody, Roland was completely overwhelmed by Nanami. He had to use more extreme methods to save himself.

Name: Annihilation
Desc: As the building collapsed, Roland fell into the ruins. He had a chance to prove himself again...

Name: Hound or Eagle
Desc: Soldiers of Babylonia gathered for the first time in the afternoon. The truth of Golden Antibody was soon announced...

Name: Unity
Desc: The queen's royal guards all appeared. Gray Raven's evacuation plan was interrupted once again.

Name: Total Alert
Desc: An hour into the ambush against Gray Raven, Golden Queen once again destroyed the Constructs' formation...

Name: Prelude of Pandemic
Desc: As the power system of Golden Vortex crashed, Babylonia's remote communication was restored. Gray Raven managed to contact Hassen...

Name: Climb
Desc: 50 minutes into the evacuation, Gray Raven and other Constructs finally found the correct route.

Name: Expansion
Desc: Minutes into the trap, Karenina discovered the secret to the expanding numbers of golden guards...

Name: Scorching Hot
Desc: 7 minutes after Bianca defeated the guards, she encountered another out-of-control guard...

Name: Gambit
Desc: Far away in the space, an emergency meeting was taking place in Babylonia's ship...

Name: Dynasty
Desc: Gray Raven successfully held off the royal guards. Infuriated, Golden Queen exposed her biggest weakness...

Name: Master Gamer
Desc: Kamui was too powerful to be contained. Golden Queen had to separate him from the others...

Name: Exit
Desc: After successfully contaminating the power system, Roland left the Golden Vortex with his damaged Construct...

Name: Collapse
Desc: Unable to stop her loss, the Golden Queen's frame broke down. Golden Vortex collapsed, and so did her "dynasty"...

Name: Source of Disaster
Desc: Before sunset, Punishing Virus converted countless defeated guards into Corrupted. They were "reborn" from the Golden Vortex's ruins...

Name: Contact and Estrangement
Desc: It seems to hide behind an electric fence, yet she is determined to reach out.

Name: Reject and Accept
Desc: Information saved

Name: Difference
Desc: Under the flickering aurora, she lets the cold wind mixed with frost and snow beat on her body and looks ahead.

Name: Strider
Desc: It is the momentary thrill of breaking free from the surface—the thrill of freedom.

Name: Pursuit
Desc: Shaking off the snow on her head, Rosetta continues to chase the CUB deep into the snow forest.

Name: Act of God
Desc: The trees and stones along the way are submerged in an instant.

Name: Frost Oath
Desc: The snow and storm has witnessed our vows to each other.

Name: Unfinished Epilogue
Desc: Is the story going to end with a tragedy filled with regrets?

Name: Death of the Piper
Desc: Those clones are herself. Her story will forever be left on a to-be-continue.

Name: Walking on the Truth
Desc: It is the second half of the soothing aria. It is the joy of a lonely whale drowning in the depth of the ocean that finally finds where it belongs. And it is the most glorious ode you sing for the vast sea when you first see it.

Name: Peony and Iris
Desc: On the lakeside where peonies and irises blossom, they tell each other about their past, how fate has brought them together, and how joyful it is to reunite.

Name: In the Name of Iris
Desc: In her hand, the girl holds a purple flower with the same name. On the other side of Leprechaun where treasures were buried. Under the rainbow, she turns around.

Name: Reasonable Nonsense
Desc: What comes around goes around. The only thing that is constant is change.

Name: The Celestial Being
Desc: When she calms her mind to listen, there are still faint sounds of bells and chanting from long ago.

Name: Please "Like" Me
Desc: Um... Why do they seem angry?

Name: An Insurmountable Ridge
Desc: No one gets to look for the Big Fish.

Name: Fireworks
Desc: The fireworks explode in the night sky and excite the crowd, bringing the celebration to a climax.

Name: Reunion
Desc: What happens now is just like what happened in the past.

Name: Homecoming
Desc: Now, it's time for those who travel far away from home to come back.

Name: Comeback
Desc: We are the Gung-hoers.

Name: Vox From Afar
Desc: A cry of a whale comes from the distance through the clouds, the roofs, and the bustling crowd.

Name: Early Spring
Desc: Hmm... A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step! Here I go!
